    • 构造器详细资料

      • FunctionDrawer

        public FunctionDrawer​(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator function,
                      int width,
                      int height,
                      double xCenter,
                      double yCenter,
                      double xScale,
                      double yScale,
                      double dx)
        Constructs a FunctionDrawer with the required parameters. This function drawer requires these parameters:
        • The function graph of which is to be rendered.
        • The size (width and height) of the frame.
        • The coordinate in the logical coordinate system of the center point of the frame.
        • The horizontal and vertical scale. Scale is how long in logical coordinate system a pixel represents.
        • The horizontal step.
          • The numeric parameters should be positive. If invalid parameter is offered, this method will choose a proper valid parameter.
        参数:
        function - the function graph of which is to be rendered
        width - the width of frame
        height - the height of frame
        xCenter - the horizontal coordinate of the center point of the frame
        yCenter - the vertical coordinate of the center point of the frame
        xScale - the horizontal scale
        yScale - the vertical scale
        dx - the horizontal step

    • 方法详细资料

      • paint

        public void paint​(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paint the graph of the given function.
        覆盖:
        paint 在类中 java.awt.Window
        参数:
        g - the target graph context

      • setFunction

        public void setFunction​(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator function)
        Clear the frame and render the new function. After invoking this method, the previous function graph will be cleared and the graph of new function will be rendered.
        参数:
        function - the new function to be rendered

      • renderFunction

        public void renderFunction​(java.util.function.DoubleUnaryOperator function)
        Straightly render the new function without clearing the frame. This method will straightly render the new function without clearing the old graph so that the graphs of both the old and new functions can be shown meanwhile.
        参数:
        function - the new function to be rendered

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        A simple executable to draw a function graph.
